data.title: Beer League (DVD)
data.meta_description: Artie DeVanzo's (Artie Lange, Dirty Work) has no job, no girlfriend and still lives with his mother (Laurie Metcalf, Lady Bird). But he does have two things to look forward to in life: beer and softball. With his best buddy Maz (Ralph Macchio, The Karate Kid), Artie plays on a softball team for Ed's Bar and Swill -- un
data.text:
If you are not 100% satisfied, you can return any item within 30 days of receipt for a full refund of the item's purchase price.

Returned items must be in the condition you received them and in the original box and/or packaging. Media products (Audio CDs, DVDs, vinyl records, etc.) must be in their original, unopened factory shrink-wrap (where applicable). Returned apparel cannot have been worn or washed, and tags cannot have been cut or removed.

A damaged or defective item can only be replaced for the same item, if available.

If there is a problem with your shipment that may be able to be solved without sending back an item, please contact us.

If you are returning for exchange, please allow 10-14 business days after we receive your return for us to process and ship your replacement order. If you are returning for refund, any monies due to you are typically processed and applied to your debit/credit card or PayPal account within 7 business days. Depending on your bank/credit card company, it may take up to two weeks after your credit is processed for it to post to your account.

Packing and Sending Your Return

To return an item, please indicate the reason for return on the invoice, include the packing slip with the item you are returning, wrap the package securely and ship to:

MVD Shop

Attn: Returns Department

203 Windsor Rd.

Pottstown, PA 19464 USA

You are responsible for the cost of shipping an item back to us. We recommend that you use of method of shipment that provides you with a tracking or delivery confirmation number.

We credit or refund shipping costs only if the return is a result of our error.
